title: Clorox to Buy Hand Sanitizer Maker GOJO for $2.25 Billion
description: Clorox Co. agreed to buy the maker of Purell hand sanitizer, GOJO Industries, a move to expand its portfolio of consumer health and hygiene brands.
content: Clorox Co. agreed to buy the maker of Purell hand sanitizer, GOJO Industries, a move to expand its portfolio of consumer health and hygiene brands.
